name: Head of Creative Production (2D, 3D video)
description:
We are looking for Head of Creative Production to establish and manage marketing video production.

This position can be based anywhere in the world (working remotely).

What you’ll do:

  • Manage projects through the entire lifecycle: planning, creative, production, delivery, and retrospectives;
  • Define project scope, including timeline, resources, labor hours, and external costs
  • Facilitate project-related team meetings (i.e. kick-offs, status, internal/client reviews, etc.), and communicates action steps to the broader team;
  • Manage, organize, and distribute all project documentation, including creative briefs, strategic plans, status reports, deliverables lists and post-project retrospectives
  • Communicate project statuses at recurring cadences, identifying and troubleshooting issues/roadblocks
  • Ensure deliverables and deadlines are communicated to all internal and external parties
  • Monitors workflow efficiency to ensure the team is working efficiently on a day-to-day basis
  • Evolve and improve processes for all aspects of project delivery with a focus on maximizing quality, collaboration, transparency and speed
  • Align with creative team leadership on high level priorities, resource allocation and availability to ensure peak efficiency across creative team
  • Ensure adherence to all deadlines
  • Understand team members strengths and growth areas
  • Promote fruitful communication and mitigate friction for cross functional projects

What you’ll bring:

  • 3+ years of experience in managing processes and workflows across a design team;
  • Understanding of production/post-production workflows, timelines and creative solutions;
  • Ability to build project management systems and timelines, continuously improve those systems;
  • Proven experience with project management applications and tools (we use ClickUp);
  • Excellent communication skills, both oral and written
  • Proven ability to manage multiple, competing priorities simultaneously
  • Ability to think strategically and execute methodically
  • Creative problem solver who is passionate about inventing new ways to approach marketing efforts
  • Excellent problem solving & conflict resolution skills;
  • Cool, calm, and collected under pressure

What you’ll get:

  • Work/Life Balance: unlimited time off, and flexible work schedules.
  • 100% remote work;
  • Competitive compensation.
